content: --आत्मन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} one whose soul is purified. {2} composed of the five elements (as the body); <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 12. 12.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} the individual (as opposed to the Supreme) soul. {2} an epithet of Brahmā. {3} of Śiva. {4} of Viṣṇu. {5} an elementary substance. {6} the body. {7} war, conflict. {8} the elementary or vital principle. {9} a soul which clings to the elements, a carnal mind; <ls>Y. 3. 34.</ls>
